sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Updates the search limit in the reservable module to 10000 when facet filter is OFF</description>
        <name>Update search limit in reservable module</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateSearchLimitInReservableModules();

function updateSearchLimitInReservableModules(){
	var logs = [];
	logs.push('Starting Update search limit in reservable module fix script in sn_wsd_rsv');
	logs.push('-------------------------------------------');
	
	var resvModuleGr = new GlideRecord(WSDConstants.TABLES.ReservableModule.name);
	resvModuleGr.addQuery('enable_facet_filter', false);
	resvModuleGr.addNullQuery("search_limit").addOrCondition('search_limit', 1000);
	resvModuleGr.query();
	while(resvModuleGr.next()){
		resvModuleGr.setValue("search_limit", 10000);
		var updateResult = resvModuleGr.update();
		if(!gs.nil(updateResult)) {
			logs.push('Successfully updated reservable module with search_limit value: ' + resvModuleGr.getDisplayValue());
			logs.push('-------------------------------------------');
			continue;
		}
		logs.push("Failed to update reservable module with search_limit value: " + resvModuleGr.getDisplayValue());
		logs.push('-------------------------------------------');
	}
	logs.push('Operation finished');
	gs.info(logs.join("\n"));
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-11-03 07:23:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c9a13592c3673010547e3810a840dda7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update search limit in reservable module</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">e9b477e9c3161010cc7060bf4b40dded</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c9a13592c3673010547e3810a840dda7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-11-03 08:06:06</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update search limit in reservable module
